properties.Who: Kashani's supporters and their clashes with Mossadegh's supporters
properties.Why: 'Iyd-i Fitr prayer and a gathering against Mossadegh's government, which resulted in clashes with pro-Mossadegh forces
Supporting Mossadegh's government
properties.Source: Niru-yi Sivvum, Khurdad 28, 30, and 31, 1332 [June 18, 20, and 21, 1953]; Mardum-i Iran, Tir 1, 1332 [June 22, 1953]; Bakhtar-i Imruz, Khurdad 30, 1332 [June 20, 1953]; Ittila'at, Khurdad 30, 1332 [June 20, 1953]; Mardum-i Iran, Tir 1, 1332 [June 22, 1953]

properties.Where: Tupkhanih Square and Sadi and Shahabad Streets
properties.Why: The party attempted to join the protest in Baharistan Square, which was rejected by Mossadeghs supporters

properties.Who: Mossadeghs supporters and the National Front Party
properties.Where: Gathering in Baharistan Square/ marching from Shahabad and Sadi Streets to Tupkhanih Squares/the second gathering in Tupkhanih Square
properties.Why: Anniversary of Siy-i Tir uprising
properties.Source: Niru-yi Sivvum, Tir 31, 1332 [July 22, 1953]; Mardum-i Iran, Murdad 1, 1332 [July 22, 1953]; Bakhtar-i Imruz, Tir 31, 1332 [July 22, 1953]; Ittilaat, Tir 31, 1332 [July 22, 1953]

properties.Where: Gathering in Baharistan Square/marching from Shahabad and Sadi Streets to Tupkhanih Square and concluding on Firduwsi Street
properties.Why: Anniversary of Siy-i Tir uprising

properties.Who: The Toilers Party and Mossadeghs supporters
properties.Where: Long march starting from Tupkhanih Square and continuing on Bab al-Humayun Street, Sabzih Miydn, Jalil Abad Street, National Garden, Firduwsi, Lalihzar, Istanbul, and Shah Reza Streets
properties.Why: Spontaneous gathering and march alongside the national referendum on the day

properties.Who: Various social groups and Mossadeghs supporters
properties.Where: Baharistan Square as the epicenter of protest/ Different parts of the northern city
properties.Why: Reaction to the unsuccessful military coup against Mossadeghs government
properties.Source: Niru-yi Sivvum, Murdad 25 and 26, 1332 [August 16 and 17, 1953]; Mardum-i Iran, Murdad 26, 1332 [August 17, 1953]; Bakhtar-i Imruz, Murdad 25 and 26, 1332 [August 16 and 17, 1953]; Ittilaat, Murdad 25 and 26, 1332 [August 16 and 17, 1953]
